attributes.action: Pressure Russia to release the Greenpeace activists.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently detaind on the ship Arctic Sunrise just off Murmansk, the greenpeace protestors (including 6 britons), were boarded in international waters, while attempting to protest against gazprom and the general expliotation of the arctic area.
Please show your support to apply pressure to the russian govenment to release them from custody.
